forumNotes.author: steve6375
forumNotes.content:
Who has floppy drives these days?

Why not use RMPrepUSB to write the boot sector to a USB Flash drive - use the **File-\>Drive** button, select the 512-byte output file, File Start=0, Drive Start=0, Length=0.

The click on the QEMU button to test it.
